name: E-shuushuu Semi-Transparent
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/"){html{background:#212121;background-repeat:no-repeat!important;background-size:cover!important;background-attachment:fixed!important;background-position:center!important}#donations .graph,#footer,#head,#sorting_controls,.display,.notice,.pagination .first,.pagination .next,.pagination .prev,.pagination li,.post .avatar img,.thumb img,div#app img,div#content p img,div.search_suggest_div,div.search_suggest_div ul,div.tooltip,form.norm,input.button,input.text,select,table,textarea{box-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000}#footer,#head,#sorting_controls,.display,.notice,div.search_suggest_div ul,form.norm,header,input.text{border:0!important;border-bottom:0 Solid#B3D9FF!important}#banner,#top_info{border-bottom:0 Solid#B3D9FF!important}#donations .graph,.pagination .first,.pagination .next,.pagination .prev,.pagination li,.post .spoiler,.post blockquote,.thumbview .display,div.noarticletext,fieldset,form.norm input,input.button,select,table,table.narrow,textarea{border:0!important}.post_foot{border-top:0 Solid#B3D9FF!important}.post .meta{border-top:0 dashed #B3D9FF!important}.post .avatar{-moz-border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0}.spoiler{background:rgba(128,128,128,.5)!important}.alert{background:rgba(0,128,128,.5)!important}tbody tr{background:rgba(92,92,92,.5)}select{background:#000!important}#query,.post .spoiler.show dd,body,div.tooltip,input.text,p,select,textarea{color:#d3d3d3!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000}#content h1,#donations h2,.display h2,.pagination,a:link,a:visited,div.search_suggest_div ul,form.norm h2,form.norm input,h1,h2,input.button{color:#b3d9ff!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000}#donations .graph,#footer,#head,#masstags_form input.text,#sorting_controls,.display,.display h2,.display h3,.image_block .meta,.notice,.pagination li,div#content table,dl.spoiler.hide,form.norm,form.norm h2,form.norm h3,form.norm input,input.button{background:rgba(64,64,92,.5)!important}#sidebar .display h2,.display h2,.display h3,.post blockquote,.title,form.norm h2,form.norm h3,h3,tfoot,thead{background:rgba(128,128,128,.5)!important}#banner,#masstags_form,.display .title h2,.display .title h3,.display dl,.image_block .meta,.odd,.post .avatar,.post .content,.post .spoiler,.post_foot,form.norm input,input.text,p,textarea{background:0 0!important}.display dl{border-left:10em solid transparent!important}.thumbview .display{border-width:0 0 0 1px}div.search_suggest_div,div.search_suggest_div li.close,div.search_suggest_div ul,div.tooltip{background:rgba(64,64,64,.8)!important}a.admin,span.admin{color:#093!important}a.tagger,span.tagger{color:#F60!important}a.moderator,span.moderator{color:#F06!important}a.reg_user{color:#00BFFF!important}}@-moz-document url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/images/"),url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/common/css"),url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/images/deactivated"){html{background:#000!important}}@-moz-document url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/forums/"){img,table{box-shadow:none}.btnbbcode,.btnmain,.helpline,.indentmenu,.post,.tablebg,input.btnlite{box-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000}.btnbbcode,.btnfile,.btnlite,.btnmain,.cat,.catdiv,.helpline,.row1,.row2,.row3,.spacer,body,th,tr{background:0 0!important}.codecontent,.indentmenu ul,.post,.tablebg{background:rgba(64,64,92,.5)!important}.attachcontent,.attachtitle,.codetitle,.quotecontent,.quotetitle{background:rgba(128,128,128,.5)!important;color:#d3d3d3!important;border-color:0 Solid #B3D9FF}.btnbbcode,.codecontent,.copyright,.helpline,.nav,.post,.postauthor,.postdetails,b,p.moderators,span.username-coloured{color:#d3d3d3!important}#wrapper,.indentmenu ul,.indentmenu ul li a,.row1,.row2,.tablebg,input,th{border:0 Solid!important}.btnfile,.btnlite,.btnmain,.indentmenu ul li a,th{color:#b3d9ff!important}table{border:none!important}.btnbbcode,.btnmain,.helpline,.post,input.btnlite{text-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000}textarea{background:0 0!important}}@-moz-document url-prefix("http://e-shuushuu.net/wiki/"){#gumax-nav li.hover a,#gumax-nav ul li a{background-color:#b3d9ff;border-bottom:0 Solid #B3D9FF}#gumax-nav a.hover,#gumax-nav ul a.hover{background-color:rgba(64,64,64,.8)}#gumax-p-search form #mw-searchButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchGoButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchInput,#pagehistory li,.catlinks,.mw-search-formheader,.tablebg,.wikitable td,.wikitable th,div#userloginForm form,div.mw-warning-with-logexcerpt,fieldset#mw-searchoptions,input#mw-Protect-submit,input#mwProtect-create-expires,input#mwProtect-reason,input#wpDiff,input#wpLoginAttempt,input#wpMailmypassword,input#wpPreview,input#wpSave,input#wpSummary,table{border:0 Solid!important}#contentSub,#contentSub2,#footer,#gumax-credit-list ul li a,#gumax-footer,#gumax-nav,#gumax-page,#gumax-special-tools ul li a,#pagehistory li,.errorbox,div.noarticletext,div.tooltip,form,h4,input#mw-Protect-submit,input#mwProtect-create-expires,input#mwProtect-reason,input#wpDiff,input#wpLoginAttempt,input#wpMailmypassword,input#wpPreview,input#wpSave,input#wpSummary,label,li,li.selected a,td,td.gumax-content-td-center,td.gumax-content-td-topleft,td.gumax-content-td-topright,tr{background:0 0!important;color:#d3d3d3!important}.autocomment,.bot,.catlinks,.minor,.newpage,input,textarea{color:#d3d3d3!important}#bodyContent a.external,#gumax-content-actions ul li a,#gumax-p-login ul li a,#preftoc a,.gumax-firstHeading,.mw-search-formheader div.search-types ul li.current a,a,h2,h3,li,th{color:#b3d9ff}#bodyContent,#gumax-content-actions ul li a,#gumax-content-actions ul li.selected a,#preferences,#toc,.catlinks,.mw-search-formheader,.prefsection legend,body,div#content table,fieldset#mw-searchoptions,h2,h3,input,table,tbody tr,textarea#wpTextbox1{background:0 0!important}#gumax-p-search form #mw-searchButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchGoButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchInput,.wikitable th,table,table.gumax-content-table{background:rgba(64,64,92,.5)!important}#gumax-nav a,#gumax-p-search form #mw-searchButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchGoButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchInput{text-shadow:1px 1px 4px #000;color:#d3d3d3}#gumax-p-search form #mw-searchButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchGoButton,#gumax-p-search form #searchInput{box-shadow:1px 1px 4px #B3D9FF;color:#d3d3d3!important}a:visited{color:#bd96ff}a:active{color:#faa700}a:hover{text-decoration:underline}a.stub{color:#723}#p-personal a.new,a.new{color:red}#p-personal
